Astronomical instruments

@graph.title: Field guide to astronomical instrumentation
abstract: This Field Guide provides readers with a concise, organized reference that explains the functions and configurations of astronomical instrumentation. This book provides an overview of aspects of astronomical instrumentation from principles of general optics and optical design to optical manufacturing and systems engineering. Practitioners will also gain valuable insight from remarks on polarimeters, interferometers, coronagraphs, cryogenics, software, and more

Glossary of symbols and acronyms -- General optics -- Optical elements -- Detectors -- Telescopes and imagers -- Spectrographs -- Polarimeters -- Interferometers -- Coronagraphs -- Adaptive optics -- Optical design -- Optomechanics -- Vacuum and cryogenics -- Software and electronics -- Systems engineering -- Manufacturing, assembly, integration, and testing -- Appendices -- Equation summary -- Bibliography -- Index
